Skills
What do I use at work

HTML5

It is what creates the framework of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure for your product

CSS3

This styling language allows me to create absolutely any look and feel for your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!

Java Script

This programming language allows you to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server and much more

Jquery

The Jquery library will speed up development. We will not integrate it into the project unless necessary, but we have the skill to work with it

React

This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product specifically for your purposes

Node.js

This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - “brains” that will perform actions that the user cannot see

Mongo.db

This is a non-relational database that will store your website or application data
